Articles.Content:
Recently I wondered if there were any mobile messaging groups based off apps like GroupMe or Line that I could join to receive assistance or just talk to others that play and share interest in the awesomeness that is the Kerbal Space Program. But I have yet to find said group.

So I have decided to make a mobile messaging group so others can quickly receive assistance and/or share their kerbal experiance

I will be making a KSP GroupMe and posting the phone number on here soon. In the meanwhile, if u have any comments feel free to smash the reply button, thx.

What about IRC? KSP has its own channel, you can connect to it by clicking the "IRC Chat" button in the forum top bar. I just checked and I'd estimate there are around 200 people online right now. There are IRC apps for smartphones and tablets, too. Makes it really easy to keep in contact with your fellow kerbalnauts.

In fact, I think I'll start using this as well.
